features: ❶ ★ [ Easy to install ] Plastic thread neckline ensures that it will not cause cross-threading and leakage problems , Metal bidet adapter valve can be connected to the toilet filling valve manually without tools , cone washer helps make installation smooth and leak-proof

❷ ★ [ No-Leak metal t valve for toilet ] It has chrome plated surface , the leak proof design , high quality brass and ceramic valve , compression resistance , explosion proof, ensuring quality and longevity , no need to worry about fracture

❸ ★ [ Screen Washer Can Extend The Use Time of Bidet ] Includes screen filter washer to bidet line , Bidet shut off valve adapter with 1/2 filter screen sealing washer Can capture sand , dust , rust or other sediment particles entering the bidet , effectively prevents water damage

❹ ★ [ Brass t-valve bidet connection Size ] 7/8 female thread to the toilet filling valve , 7/8 male thread to the water supply ( 7/8 cock thread compatible 15/16 - 14UNS ) , 1/2 thread or 3/8 Compression thread to the bidet hose

❺ ★ [ 7/8 bidet adapter t valve ] Used to shut off water flow when not in use and adjust water pressure to suit your needs, there is no need to worry about affecting the water flow of the toilet after installing the bidet adapter valve

❻ ★ [ 7/8" toilet t connector ] Package include : 1xbidet t valve adapter , 2 x 7/8 cone washer , 1 x 1/2 fill hose filter screen sealing washer , 1 x 1/2 female thread to 3/8 male thread hose connector

❼ [ 7/8 t adapter bidet connector 3 way tee valve ] Each 7/8x7/8x1/2 or 3/8 bidet adapter valve has passed strict quality test , our 30-day full refund or exchange promise lets you buy and use your bathroom pipe with total peace of mind
❽ Ideal for households with children (bidet can be "locked" so it cannot be turned on by accident)
❾For any questions about the bidet 7/8 t valve, please contact us:Regarding brass t adapter bidet 7/8 related issues, We promise to reply within 24 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Metal T Valve for Toilet Bidet Used In the Toilet System The bibet t-valve installed under the toilet tank. Shut-off Valve gives ability to turn off or adjust/reduce the water pressure coming into the bidet.There is no need to worry about affecting the water flow of the toilet after installing the bidet adapter valve. High Quality & Easy to install Plastic thread neckline ensures that it will not cause cross-threading and leakage problems. Cone washer helps make installation smooth and leak-proof.Screen washer can prevent leakage caused by particle blockage. Add 1/2 to 3/8 adapters to connect more bidet sizes. Built for Long Lasting Made of solid brass, the T-valve is corrosion-resistant and built to last. The explosion-proof and anti-pressure construction ensures reliability and long-lasting quality.

No-Leak Metal Bidet T Connector 7/8 x 7/8 x 1/2 or 3/8 compression thread Bidet 3-way adapter valve to turn off or reduce/adjust the water pressure coming into the bidet There is no need to worry about affecting the water flow of the toilet after installing the t valve for bidet 7/8 metal bidet t-adapter valve suitable for combination with most American toilets,such as: bidet sprayer, diaper sprayer, bidet, etc(US standard size 7/8 inch interface)Bidet t valve adapter is not compatible with shower head and faucet diverter,not suitable for combined use of toilets in European countries. Each connection port of the T adapter is equipped with a high-quality sealant pad,the installation can be easily completed by connecting each connection port with a high-quality sealant pad. Package include:1xbidet t valve adaptor , 2x7/8 Cone washer,1x1/2fill hose filter screen sealing washer 1x1/2 female thread to 3/8 (9/16)male thread hose connector

No-Leak Metal Bidet T Connector 7/8 x 7/8 x 1/2 or 3/8 compression thread Bidet 3-way adapter valve to turn off or reduce/adjust the water pressure coming into the bidet There is no need to worry about affecting the water flow of the toilet after installing the t valve for bidet 7/8 metal bidet t-adapter valve suitable for combination with most American toilets,such as: bidet sprayer, diaper sprayer, bidet, etc(US standard size 7/8 inch interface)Bidet t valve adapter is not compatible with shower head and faucet diverter,not suitable for combined use of toilets in European countries. Each connection port of the T adapter is equipped with a high-quality sealant pad,the installation can be easily completed by connecting each connection port with a high-quality sealant pad. Package include:1xbidet t valve adaptor , 2x7/8 Cone washer,1x1/2fill hose filter screen sealing washer 1x1/2 female thread to 3/8 (9/16)male thread hose connector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a hose that came with a similar valve but it was all metal. I had trouble connecting it to my existing toilet, since the connection was metal to plastic. With this item, everything worked out perfectly, easy to connect and no leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality Valve, super smooth and no leaks. Comes with a screen filter too!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when installing a new bidet so that I can control the maximum water pressure and I can shut off the bidet when the grandkids come over. This valve goes right onto the toilet water valve stem, just hand tighten. Then the hose from the wall valve screws into it and your bidet inlet hose screws into the 1/2" or 3/8" out. The reducer is included and so is a nice screen filter to prevent your bidet from getting clogged. This is a high quality valve with a high quality finish and super smooth operation. If you're installing a bidet, get one! In the pic, the on/off lever is facing rear so you can't see it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I dreaded having to install this because my past experience with cheaper adapters has been that you connect everything together, turn on the shut off valve and water sprays all over the place. So you turn off the valve and start tightening things. Turn on the valve and again, water sprays everywhere. Then you think "maybe I overtightened something" This can go on for a frustratingly long time and there are three places for the leak to be.With this adapter, I connected everything, tightened to what seemed right, turned on the valve and hey presto it worked first time. No leaks! Almost couldn't believe it. What usually takes forever took a few minutes. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but not easy to install without leaks for an unskilled person
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes that this would be an easy install for someone with minimal plumbing experience, but alas I had a few issues with leaks, and ultimately had to ask my more construction experienced husband to troubleshoot for me. One of the issues was that the cone shaped rubber gasket/washer that sits in the top female valve thingie wasn't seated inside correctly, and he ended up swapping it out for one of the flat rubber gaskets that came with the original t adaptor that came with our bidet. My husband was able to install it without leaks thankfully, and then it worked really well to adjust the water pressure to our bidet to a comfortable level instead of full blast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product But Read This
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the YHUX Bidet T adapter because it had a shut off, which allows you to shut off water to the Bidet (in case there is a problem/leak) while continuing to allow water to flow to the toilet.The YHUX Brass Bidet T adapter is quite heavy, has a nice chrome plating and comes with a 1/2" to 3/8" adapter which allows it to work on numerous bidet products. It feels well made. Most of the washers are included. I say most because if you look the second picture I've attached of the supply line, it comes with a cone washer...the YHUX valve does not, so be careful when you remove the supply line from the toilet fill valve not to damage the cone washer as you will need it to connect to the bottom of the YHUX... and you may want to separately purchase another one to use vs the flat washer that YHUX supplies...my personal feeling is that the cone washer is less prone to leaking.My toilet has a fluidmaster 400 toilet fill valve...and no matter how hard I tried, I could not get the YHUX to thread up tightly onto the fill valve. I had a new, spare fluidmaster v and tried mating the YHUX to it...perfect fit. So, needless to say, I replaced the valve already installed in the toilet with a new valve....which was seven years old and may have been nearing the end of its life anyway.I did not use teflon tape when connecting the YHUX to the fluidmaster, but I did use teflon tape to for the water supply line connection to the YHUX, for the 1/2" to 3/8" adapter connection and for the 3/8" supply line to the bidet I chose....no leaks.Finally, and this is just an fyi, look at the picture of the YHUX connected to the toilet valve but before the bidet supply line was connected. You will note that in order for the bidet supply line connection to be facing forward, the shut off valve will be to the rear...making it hard to see....but it is easy to turn and does it's job perfectly.Would I buy this product again and do I recommend it....absolutely yes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked Like a Charm
reviews.reviewText: Used it to replace the broken one from a Joy Bidet. Easy to install and no leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Standard design and good quality of T adapter
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for installing the bidet for my toilet. It is easy to install and good qualily, no water leakage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty, easy to install, partially solved the problem.
reviews.reviewText: After reading all the reviews, I got this valve to control the water pressure of the Luxe bidet. The Luxe bidet valve control is very disappointing and bad in design. Turning the knob clockwise starts increasing the water pressure a little and then it suddenly goes to max pressure, enough to cause serious injury. There is no gradual increase of pressure.I thought that this YUHX T valve would fully solve the problem. However, all this T valve does is limit the total pressure going into the bidet. It doesn’t allow the Luxe valve to have a gradual increase in pressure over the full range of motion. After installing the YUHX T valve, the Luxe bidet pressure does the same thing as before, but doesn’t go to full pressure because of the YUHX T valve. It’s a compromise and I guess I have to live with it. The problem is not with the YUHX valve but is with the badly designed Luxe bidet controls. Prior to the Luxe I had an Astor CB1000 bidet that didn’t have the pressure control problem. However, the Astor was cheaply made and simply failed after a few months of use.
